item.description:
Meetup member John shared this information about a hike for families with special needs children...

In case anyone out there is a parent of a special child or knows someone who cares for a child with a developmental disability - the Litchfield County Autism Spectrum Association, Inc. and the CT FEAT organizations are co-sponsoring a kid-friendly hike at Kent Falls State Park on Saturday, June 16th at 2:00 p.m. We will meet on the South side of the parking lot and have picnic (bring your own stuff) after the hike.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Special needs hike and picnic
